7.  [used to form future tenses, especially the future subjunctive] だろう
8.  [used to form the passive voice] られる, れる
9.  [used to indicate that the subject and object are the same] だ, です, である

2.  [math: to simplify a formula] 簡約, 約分
3.  [metallurgy: to remove non-metals from metal] 不純物を取り除く
4.  [to bring down] 減らす, 下げる, 削減
5.  [to bring to an inferior rank] 下げる, 切り詰める
6.  [to bring to an inferior state or condition] 強いる
7.  [to bring to terms; to humble; to conquer; to subdue; to capture] 鎮める, 鎮圧
8.  [to decrease the liquid in food] 煮詰める
9.  [to lose weight] 減る
